high_descs: pick up the book from the desk
take the book to the nightstand near the plant
pull the chain on the lamp to turn it on
anns.task_desc: get a book from the desk then turn the lamp on

high_descs: Turn to your right and walk to the desk.
Pick up the book from the desk.
Approach the lamp on the far right of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Read a book using the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Pick up book, located next to cd.
Turn right, proceed forward.  When reach end of desk, turn right to face desk.
Turn on lamp on the back of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up book and turn on lamp.
